name: Slide the Slime
description:
A chill game with a slime protagonist. Made for the Games Now! Online Jam #1 in 2020 as a solo project by Qazhax. The design constraint of the jam was 'Minimal instructions', so I tried to make the game simple enough to play even without any experience in games, without giving any explicit instructions on how to play the game.

I really wanted to make it possible for the player to smooch other slimes but ran out of time for adding other slimes. Slime Smooching game next time? Maybe.

  • Programmer: Qazhax
  • Engine: Godot
  • Composer: Qazhax
  • Music tool: BeepBox
  • Sound effects: Sonniss GDC 2019
  • Artist: Qazhax
  • Sprite drawing tool: Clip Studio Paint
  • Tile drawing tool: Tilemancer
